title: Choco-Walnut Brownie
description: A decadent chocolate walnut brownie recipe that combines rich dark chocolate with crunchy walnuts, perfect for indulging your sweet tooth.
author: Saurabh

body.raw:
# Chocolate Walnut Brownie Recipe

## Ingredients:
- 80g melted unsalted butter
- 200g condensed milk
- 2-3 drops vanilla essence
- 120g all-purpose flour (maida)
- 30g good quality cocoa powder
- 250g dark chocolate (175g melted and 75g in chunks)
- 1/2 tsp baking powder
- 1/4 tsp baking soda
- Crushed roasted walnuts

## Instructions:

1. **Preheat Oven:** Preheat your oven to 200°C (390°F) and line a 9x9 inch baking tray with parchment paper.

2. **Prepare Wet Ingredients:**
   - In a large bowl, mix melted unsalted butter, condensed milk, and vanilla essence until well combined.

3. **Prepare Dry Ingredients:**
   - In another bowl, sift together all-purpose flour, cocoa powder, baking powder, and baking soda.

4. **Combine Wet and Dry Ingredients:**
   - Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, mixing until just combined. Do not overmix.

5. **Add Melted Chocolate:**
   - Fold in 175g of melted dark chocolate into the batter.

6. **Transfer to Baking Tray:**
   - Pour the batter into the prepared baking tray and spread it evenly.

7. **Add Toppings:**
   - Sprinkle the remaining 75g of dark chocolate chunks and crushed roasted walnuts on top of the batter.

8. **Bake:** Bake in the preheated oven for 18-22 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out with a few moist crumbs.

9. **Cool and Serve:** Allow the brownies to cool in the tray until warm to touch. Cut into squares and enjoy with a scoop of fresh vanilla ice cream.

Enjoy the rich and fudgy Chocolate Walnut Brownies!

title: Cauliflower Crispy
description: A delicious and crispy cauliflower dish inspired by Chicken 65, coated in chickpea flour and garnished with fried curry leaves and green chilies.
author: Saurabh

body.raw:
# Cauliflower Crispy 65 Recipe

**Description:** A delicious and crispy cauliflower dish inspired by Chicken 65, coated in chickpea flour and garnished with fried curry leaves and green chilies.

## Ingredients:
- 1 medium cauliflower, cut into florets
- 1 cup chickpea flour (besan)
- 2 tablespoons rice flour
- 1 tablespoon ginger-garlic paste
- 1 tablespoon lemon juice
- 1 teaspoon red chili powder
- 1/2 teaspoon turmeric powder
- 1/2 teaspoon garam masala
- Salt to taste
- Water, as needed
- Oil for frying
- Fresh curry leaves and green chilies, for garnish

## Instructions:

1. **Prepare the Cauliflower:**
   - Blanch the cauliflower florets in hot water for 3-4 minutes. Drain and set aside.

2. **Make the Batter:**
   - In a bowl, combine chickpea flour, rice flour, ginger-garlic paste, lemon juice, red chili powder, turmeric powder, garam masala, and salt.
   - Add water gradually to make a thick batter, ensuring there are no lumps.

3. **Coat the Cauliflower:**
   - Dip each blanched cauliflower floret into the batter, ensuring it is well-coated.

4. **Fry the Cauliflower:**
   - Heat oil in a deep frying pan over medium-high heat.
   - Fry the coated cauliflower florets in batches until golden brown and crispy. Drain on paper towels.

5. **Garnish:**
   - In the same oil, fry fresh curry leaves and green chilies until crisp. Use these to garnish the fried cauliflower.

6. **Serve:**
   - Serve the crispy cauliflower 65 hot as a snack or appetizer, optionally with a side of mint chutney or sauce of your choice.

Enjoy the crispy and flavorful Cauliflower Crispy 65!

title: Cheesy Garlic Bread
description: A delicious and easy-to-make cheesy garlic bread using sandwich bread, topped with freshly grated garlic for an extra burst of flavor.
author: Saurabh

body.raw:
# Cheesy Garlic Bread on Sandwich Bread Recipe

**Description:** A delicious and easy-to-make cheesy garlic bread using sandwich bread, topped with freshly grated garlic for an extra burst of flavor.

## Ingredients:
- 4 slices of sandwich bread
- 1/2 cup shredded mozzarella cheese
- 2 tablespoons butter, softened
- 2 cloves garlic, grated using a microplane
- 1 tablespoon fresh parsley, chopped (optional)
- Salt and pepper, to taste

## Instructions:

1. **Preheat the Oven:** Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.

2. **Prepare the Bread:**
   - Place the sandwich bread slices on the prepared baking sheet.

3. **Make the Garlic Butter:**
   - In a small bowl, mix the softened butter, grated garlic, chopped parsley (if using), salt, and pepper.

4. **Add the Toppings:**
   - Spread the garlic butter mixture evenly over each bread slice.
   - Sprinkle the shredded mozzarella cheese over the buttered bread slices.

5. **Bake the Garlic Bread:**
   - Place the baking sheet in the preheated oven and bake for about 8-10 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly, and the edges of the bread are golden brown.

6. **Serve:**
   - Remove from the oven and let it cool slightly.
   - Cut the cheesy garlic bread into halves or quarters and serve warm as a snack or side dish.

Enjoy the cheesy goodness of this quick and tasty garlic bread!

toc.text: Cheesy Garlic Bread on Sandwich Bread Recipe

title: Indian Chicken Popcorn
description: Crunchy bite-sized chicken pieces marinated in a flavorful blend of spices and deep-fried to perfection, inspired by the famous Chicken 65.
author: Saurabh

body.raw:
# Indian Chicken Popcorn 65 Recipe

**Description:** Crunchy bite-sized chicken pieces marinated in a flavorful blend of spices and deep-fried to perfection, inspired by the famous Chicken 65.

## Ingredients:
- 500g boneless chicken, cut into small cubes
- 1 tablespoon ginger-garlic paste
- 1 tablespoon lemon juice
- 1 teaspoon red chili powder
- 1/2 teaspoon turmeric powder
- 1/2 teaspoon garam masala
- 1/2 teaspoon cumin powder
- 1/2 teaspoon coriander powder
- 1/4 teaspoon black pepper powder
- 2 tablespoons corn flour
- 2 tablespoons rice flour
- 2 tablespoons plain yogurt
- Salt to taste
- Oil for deep frying
- Curry leaves and green chilies for garnish

## Instructions:

1. **Marinate the Chicken:**
   - In a bowl, combine ginger-garlic paste, lemon juice, red chili powder, turmeric powder, garam masala, cumin powder, coriander powder, black pepper powder, corn flour, rice flour, yogurt, and salt.
   - Add the chicken pieces to the marinade and mix well. Allow it to marinate for at least 1 hour in the refrigerator.

2. **Fry the Chicken:**
   - Heat oil in a deep frying pan over medium-high heat.
   - Once the oil is hot, add the marinated chicken pieces in batches, ensuring they are not overcrowded.
   - Fry until the chicken is golden brown and cooked through. Remove from the oil and drain on paper towels.

3. **Serve:**
   - Garnish with curry leaves and sliced green chilies.
   - Serve hot as an appetizer or snack, optionally with a side of mint chutney or sauce of your choice.

Enjoy the crispy and flavorful Indian Chicken Popcorn 65!

title: Mutton Kheema
description: Embrace the principles of web accessibility and ensure that your web applications reach all users, regardless of their abilities.
author: Saurabh

body.raw:
# Mutton Kheema with Bread and Sunny Side-Up Egg

## Ingredients:
- 500g mutton kheema (minced mutton)
- 2 tablespoons oil
- 1 onion, finely chopped
- 2 tomatoes, finely chopped
- 2 green chilies, finely chopped
- 1 tablespoon ginger-garlic paste
- 1 teaspoon cumin seeds
- 1 teaspoon coriander powder
- 1/2 teaspoon turmeric powder
- 1/2 teaspoon red chili powder
- Salt, to taste
- Fresh coriander leaves, chopped, for garnish
- Bread slices, toasted, for serving
- Eggs, for frying

## Instructions:

1. **Cook the Kheema:**
   - Heat oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add cumin seeds and let them splutter.
   - Add chopped onions and sauté until they turn golden brown.
   - Add ginger-garlic paste and green chilies, and sauté for another minute.
   - Add chopped tomatoes and cook until they soften.

2. **Add Spices:**
   - Add coriander powder, turmeric powder, red chili powder, and salt. Mix well.
   - Add the minced mutton (kheema) and mix everything together. Cook for about 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the kheema is cooked through.

3. **Prepare the Eggs:**
   - In a separate pan, fry the eggs sunny side-up.

4. **Serve:**
   - To serve, place a spoonful of mutton kheema on a plate.
   - Top with a fried egg.
   - Garnish with fresh coriander leaves.
   - Serve hot with toasted bread slices.

Enjoy the delicious and hearty Mutton Kheema with Bread and Sunny Side-Up Egg!

title: Prawns Koliwada
description: Crispy and spicy deep-fried prawns coated in a gram flour batter, a popular Indian appetizer known for its bold flavors.
author: Saurabh

body.raw:
# Prawns Koliwada Recipe

## Ingredients:
- 500g fresh prawns, cleaned and deveined
- 1 cup gram flour (besan)
- 2 tablespoons rice flour
- 1 tablespoon ginger-garlic paste
- 1 tablespoon lemon juice
- 1 teaspoon red chili powder
- 1/2 teaspoon turmeric powder
- 1/2 teaspoon garam masala
- Salt to taste
- Oil for deep frying
- Lemon wedges and onion rings for garnish
- Fresh coriander leaves for garnish

## Instructions:

1. **Marinate the Prawns:**
   - In a bowl, mix together ginger-garlic paste, lemon juice, red chili powder, turmeric powder, garam masala, and salt.
   - Add the cleaned prawns to the marinade and mix well to coat the prawns evenly. Let it marinate for 30 minutes.

2. **Prepare the Batter:**
   - In a separate bowl, combine gram flour (besan), rice flour, salt, and a pinch of red chili powder.
   - Gradually add water to make a thick batter. The consistency should be thick enough to coat the prawns well.

3. **Coat the Prawns:**
   - Heat oil in a deep frying pan or kadhai over medium-high heat.
   - Dip each marinated prawn into the batter, ensuring it's coated evenly.
   - Carefully drop the coated prawns into the hot oil. Fry in batches to avoid overcrowding the pan.
   - Fry until the prawns turn golden brown and crispy. Remove from the oil using a slotted spoon and drain excess oil on paper towels.

4. **Serve:**
   - Garnish with lemon wedges, onion rings, and fresh coriander leaves.
   - Serve hot with mint chutney or your favorite dipping sauce.

Enjoy your crispy and flavorful Prawns Koliwada!

title: Spaghetti Lamb Ragu
description: A hearty and comforting dish, this spaghetti lamb ragu features tender lamb cooked in a rich tomato sauce, perfect for a cozy meal.
author: Saurabh

body.raw:
# Spaghetti Lamb Ragu Recipe

## Ingredients:
- 500g lamb mince
- 1 onion, finely chopped
- 2 garlic cloves, minced
- 2 carrots, finely chopped
- 2 celery stalks, finely chopped
- 400g canned chopped tomatoes
- 2 tablespoons tomato paste
- 1 cup beef or vegetable stock
- 1 teaspoon dried oregano
- 1 teaspoon dried thyme
- Salt and pepper, to taste
- 400g spaghetti
- Grated Parmesan cheese, to serve
- Fresh basil leaves, to garnish

## Instructions:

1. **Cook the Lamb:**
   - Heat a large saucepan over medium heat and add the lamb mince. Cook, breaking up the mince with a spoon, until browned.

2. **Add Vegetables:**
   - Add the onion, garlic, carrots, and celery to the saucepan. Cook, stirring occasionally, for about 5 minutes, or until the vegetables start to soften.

3. **Add Tomatoes and Stock:**
   - Stir in the canned tomatoes, tomato paste, stock, oregano, and thyme. Season with salt and pepper.

4. **Simmer:**
   - Bring the mixture to a simmer, then reduce the heat to low. Cover and cook for about 1 to 1 1/2 hours, stirring occasionally, until the lamb is tender and the sauce has thickened.

5. **Cook Spaghetti:**
   - Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.

6. **Combine:**
   - Add the cooked spaghetti to the lamb ragu and toss to combine.

7. **Serve:**
   - Serve the spaghetti lamb ragu hot, topped with grated Parmesan cheese and fresh basil leaves.

Enjoy the comforting flavors of this spaghetti lamb ragu!

title: Detoroit style Pizza
description: A delicious Detroit-style pizza with a thick, crispy crust, topped with flavorful chicken, capsicum, and onion.
author: Saurabh

body.raw:
# Detroit-Style Chicken Pizza 

## Ingredients:
- 1 batch of Detroit-style pizza dough
- 1/2 cup pizza sauce
- 2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese
- 1/2 cup cooked chicken, shredded or diced
- 1/2 cup capsicum, thinly sliced
- 1/2 cup onion, thinly sliced
- 2 tablespoons olive oil
- Salt and pepper, to taste
- Optional: grated Parmesan cheese, red pepper flakes, fresh basil

## Instructions:

1. **Preheat the Oven:** Preheat your oven to 475°F (245°C). Place a seasoned Detroit-style pizza pan or baking dish in the oven to preheat as well.

2. **Prepare the Dough:**
   - Press the pizza dough into the preheated pan, spreading it evenly to the edges and up the sides.

3. **Add the Toppings:**
   - Spread the pizza sauce evenly over the dough.
   - Sprinkle half of the shredded mozzarella cheese over the sauce.
   - Layer the chicken, capsicum, and onion evenly over the cheese.
   - Season with salt and pepper.

4. **Add the Cheese Layer:**
   - Sprinkle the remaining mozzarella cheese over the toppings.

5. **Bake the Pizza:**
   - Drizzle olive oil over the top of the pizza.
   - Bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the cheese is bubbly and caramelized.

6. **Serve:**
   - Remove the pizza from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
   - Optional: sprinkle with grated Parmesan cheese, red pepper flakes, and fresh basil before serving.

Enjoy the unique and delicious flavors of this Detroit-style pizza!

title: Veg Crispy
description: A delightful and crunchy vegetarian crispy dish made with a colorful assortment of vegetables, perfect as a snack or appetizer.
author: Saurabh

body.raw:
# Veg Crispy Recipe

## Ingredients:
- 1 cup mixed vegetables (such as capsicum, carrot, onion, and cauliflower), thinly sliced
- 1/2 cup all-purpose flour
- 2 tablespoons corn flour
- 1 tablespoon rice flour
- 1 teaspoon ginger-garlic paste
- 1 teaspoon soy sauce
- 1/2 teaspoon red chili powder
- Salt to taste
- Water, as needed
- Oil for deep frying
- Spring onions, chopped, for garnish
- Sesame seeds, for garnish

## Instructions:

1. **Prepare the Vegetables:**
   - Thinly slice the vegetables and set aside.

2. **Make the Batter:**
   - In a bowl, mix all-purpose flour, corn flour, rice flour, ginger-garlic paste, soy sauce, red chili powder, and salt.
   - Add water gradually to make a thick batter, ensuring there are no lumps.

3. **Coat the Vegetables:**
   - Heat oil in a deep frying pan over medium-high heat.
   - Dip the sliced vegetables into the batter, ensuring they are well-coated.

4. **Fry the Vegetables:**
   - Fry the coated vegetables in batches until golden brown and crispy. Drain on paper towels.

5. **Garnish and Serve:**
   - Garnish with chopped spring onions and sesame seeds.
   - Serve hot as a snack or appetizer, optionally with a side of sweet chili sauce or ketchup.

Enjoy the crispy and flavorful Veg Crispy!
